titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on Pigment Yellow 154.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/9/2004--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2006, the suspension of duty on Pigment Yellow 154.
